# devflow Documentation Index

> Go library for AI-powered development workflows: git operations, LLM integration via flowgraph, transcript management, artifact storage, notifications.

## Quick Start
- CLAUDE.md - Project overview, quick reference, implementation status
- README.md - User-facing documentation with examples
- docs/OVERVIEW.md - Vision, core components, use cases

## Architecture
- docs/ARCHITECTURE.md - System design, type definitions
- docs/API_REFERENCE.md - Complete public API

## By Component

### Git Operations
- CLAUDE.md#git-operations - Quick examples
- docs/API_REFERENCE.md#git-operations - Full API

### LLM Client (via flowgraph)
- CLAUDE.md#llm-client-via-flowgraph - Quick examples
- docs/API_REFERENCE.md#llm-client-via-flowgraph - Context injection

### Transcripts
- CLAUDE.md#transcripts - Quick examples
- docs/API_REFERENCE.md#transcript-management - Full API

### Artifacts
- CLAUDE.md#artifacts - Quick examples
- docs/API_REFERENCE.md#artifact-management - Full API

### Notifications
- CLAUDE.md#notifications - Quick examples
- docs/API_REFERENCE.md#notifications - Slack, webhook notifiers

### Workflow Nodes
- CLAUDE.md#integration-with-flowgraph - Node examples
- docs/API_REFERENCE.md#pre-built-workflow-nodes - All 10 nodes

## Related
- flowgraph - Foundation layer (graph orchestration + LLM abstraction)
- task-keeper - Product layer (commercial SaaS)
